languages.text: "Стоило сразу признаться, что ты промышляешь ксеноартефактами. Мне всегда были интересны технологии нелюдей".
"You should have admitted right away that you deal in xeno-artefacts. I've always been fascinated by non-human technology."
languages.original_text: "Стоило сразу признаться, что ты промышляешь ксеноартефактами. Мне всегда были интересны технологии нелюдей".

traits.locale_text: "You should have admitted right away that you deal in xeno-artifacts. I've always been fascinated by inhuman technology."
"You should have admitted right away that you deal in xeno-artifacts. I've always been fascinated by inhuman technology."
"You should have admitted right away that you deal in xeno-artefacts. I've always been fascinated by non-human technology."
"You should have admitted right away that you deal in xeno-artefacts. I've always been fascinated by non-human technology."
"You should have admitted right away that you deal in xeno-artefacts. I've always been fascinated by non-human technology."

languages.text: “你本该告诉我，你做的是异形制品相关的生意。我一直对非人类的技术很着迷。”
languages.original_text: "You should have admitted right away that you deal in xeno-artefacts. I've always been fascinated by non-human technology."

traits.locale_text: “你本该告诉我，你做的是异形制品相关的生意。我一直对非人类的技术很着迷。”

languages.text: «Tendría que haber admitido desde un primer momento que trafica con xenoartefactos. Siempre me ha fascinado la tecnología no humana».
languages.original_text: "You should have admitted right away that you deal in xeno-artefacts. I've always been fascinated by non-human technology."

traits.locale_text: «Tendría que haber admitido desde un primer momento que trafica con xenoartefactos. Siempre me ha fascinado la tecnología no humana».

languages.text: 「異種族のアーティファクト引しているとすぐに認めればよかったのに。私は常に非人類の技術に魅了されてきた」
languages.original_text: "You should have admitted right away that you deal in xeno-artefacts. I've always been fascinated by non-human technology."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族のアーティファクト引しているとすぐに認めればよかったのに。私は常に非人類の技術に魅了されてきた」

languages.text: "Ihr hättet sofort zugeben sollen, dass Ihr mit Xeno-Artefakten handelt. Mich hat nicht-menschliche Technologie immer fasziniert."
languages.original_text: "You should have admitted right away that you deal in xeno-artefacts. I've always been fascinated by non-human technology."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hättet sofort zugeben sollen, dass Ihr mit Xeno-Artefakten handelt. Mich hat nicht-menschliche Technologie immer fasziniert."

languages.text: « Vous auriez dû admettre dès le départ que vous trafiquiez des xéno-artefacts. J'ai toujours trouvé les technologies non humaines fascinantes. »
languages.original_text: "You should have admitted right away that you deal in xeno-artefacts. I've always been fascinated by non-human technology."

traits.locale_text: « Vous auriez dû admettre dès le départ que vous trafiquiez des xéno-artefacts. J'ai toujours trouvé les technologies non humaines fascinantes. »

languages.text: "Zeno eserleri alıp sattığını neden daha önce söylemedin? İnsan dışıların teknolojileri özel ilgi alanımdır."
languages.original_text: "You should have admitted right away that you deal in xeno-artefacts. I've always been fascinated by non-human technology."

traits.locale_text: "Zeno eserleriyle uğraştığınızı neden daha önce söylemedin? İnsan dışıların teknolojileri özel ilgi alanımdır."
